pages.title: Repair station
pages.text: The Repair station restores durability on damaged tools and armor by consuming $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycles$(). Insert a damaged item and the station will start repairing it.

pages.title: Power
pages.text: The station draws cycles from your network through adjacent $(l:logicore:components/data_cable)Data Cables$(). Each point of durability costs cycles, so higher-cost items take longer and consume more. It holds one item at a time.
A single-slot machine that automatically repairs damaged gear.
